con:config.script:
String date = new Date() date = date.replaceAll(":","_") date = date.replaceAll(" ","_") Email_ID = "\"" + date + "@mailinator.com" + "\"" Email_ID = Email_ID.toUpperCase() Email_ID_string = date + "@mailinator.com" Email_ID_string = Email_ID_string.toUpperCase() testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Email_ID", Email_ID) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("Email_ID_string", Email_ID_string)
def Brand_Name = context.expand( '${DataSource#Brand}' ) Brand_Name = Brand_Name.replace("\"", "") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Brand_Name", Brand_Name) def Country_Name = context.expand( '${DataSource#Country_Name}' ) Country_Name = Country_Name.replace("\"", "") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Country_Name", Country_Name) def Region = context.expand( '${DataSource#Region}' ) Region = Region.replace("\"", "") testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Region", Region)
